Description: Fragment of neck and flattened handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Pythodoros. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0210.29.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (230)
